name: Message in a bottle (Hechi)
description:
INTRODUCTION 

You wake up on a remote island for no apparent reason. The only thing you have nearby is paper and a bottle.

What would you say to the rest of the world?

Message in a bottle is a First Person game with a multiplayer component where you can share messages with other castaways like you.

 CONTROLS 

WASD - Standard 3D movement

Space - Jump

E - Interect with items

Left clic - Throw item

Right clic - Drop item

ESC- Cancel

This game has been created during the ludum dare 50. 

Theme: Delay the inevitable
